name: Slayride VR
description:
**Requires an Oculus Headset** (it may work with other headsets but I do not believe it will at this time).

Slay all of the Santa's before they steal your presents!

Press and hold the Grip button to pickup a gun and use the trigger to fire.

This game is for the JamFam group's second Game Jam. This was my first time attempting to make a VR game so there are some issues with a few bugs where you do not seem to hit your target but if you fire a few times it starts working again.

Have fun and Slay Santa!
